Name: Hunk Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry dropped into glass.
Review: Pineapple and vanilla combine harmoniously. American readers may notice more than a passing resemblance to a Key Lime Pie served without the Graham Cracker rim.
History: The Neo-Martini/Altern'atini Carrie Bradshaw and friends discovered in the summer of 2003. In this series, the Sex and the City stars dropped Cosmopolitans in favour of Hunks - no change there then.
Nutrition: One serving of Hunk Martini contains 148 calories
